trans-unit.source: This element is a high-impact banner section featuring a bold headline and a centrally placed call-to-action button. It appears at the top of the page and is used to highlight a key topic, campaign, or action. The headline communicates a clear core message, while the button leads directly to the next step (e.g. video, landing page, form). It is ideal for strong, campaign-driven page introductions.
